name: Game Boy Advance Video: Codename: Kids Next Door: Volume 1
description: Now you can watch the covert missions of the Kids Next Door in the palm of your hand. Volume 1 of this Game Boy Advance Video series includes four episodes from the animated show, Codename: Kids Next Door. Follow the kids as they solve a mystery in 'Operation: R.E.P.O.R.T.,' defend their tree house in 'Operation: N.O. -- P.O.W.U.H.,' get to the bottom of Numbuh One's odd behavior in 'Operation: B.R.I.E.F.,' and track down a mysterious pilot in 'Operation: D.O.G.F.I.G.H.T.'
